alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 12 at 4:16AM AKST until December 12 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...High winds will blow around unsecured objects and may damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to diminish below high wind criteria (60 mph) Tuesday morning but are expected to remain elevated through Tuesday night. A wind shift to the south is expected Tuesday night as the bulk of the new low moves into the northern gulf.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure vessels and loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Report any damage to the National Weather Service by visiting weather.gov/Juneau/StormReports
